item.title: What is wrong with this script?
item.dc:creator: @Starblaster100 Starblaster100
item.description:
@Starblaster100 wrote:

Click Mouse is SCARs default way of clicking the mouse, however it is said to be quite detectable

Mouse is a Procedure in SRL and is a lot less detectable

Read full topic

item.source: What is wrong with this script?

item.title: What is wrong with this script?
item.dc:creator: @scarscaper4life scarscaper4life
item.description:
@scarscaper4life wrote:

ok well i have fix up your script abit.

program clickacolour; {.include srl/srl.scar}

procedure setup;
begin
setupsrl;
end;

procedure click;
begin

If (FindColor(x, y, 1855642, 100, 255, 255, 100))then
Mouse(x, y , 0 , 0, true);
end;

begin
setup;
click;
end.

in your script you left the words var in the find color function var just tell you what kind of thing it is like interger bolean etc etc. also you last end MUST always have a . like this end. if you have a ; your script never ends so you will get an error. i also added SRL into your script. if you do just want to use the function clickmouse for another game other than rs then clickmouse will probly be alright but if its for runescape the use mouse(x,y,0,0).

hope i explained it alright just ask if you need anymore help

Read full topic
